Title: I wish there was a way to enter Normal mode in the vim command line. After entering 'set paste' is t...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: I wish there was a way to enter Normal mode in the vim command line. After entering 'set paste' is there no better way to enter 'set nopaste' than 'up, left x5 no'? Feels like 'kbno' should work.
